content: hey friends and fellow crafters I got
some exciting news I was checking out some other glue guns and I fell in love
with this sure bond or glue gun okay I've been a fan of their glue for years
I really love their glue and now I'm in love with one of their glue guns and I
want to show it to you guys okay I actually talked to sure bonder and they
want to become a sponsor of the Dan's crafts oh isn't that fantastic
finally the Dan scrap gets a glue gun sponsor right and you know how much I
love my glue but I am in love with this Luke this new glue gun and I want to
show you guys all the fantastic features that were kind of missing from my other
glue gun and let's hit the table and I'll talk about why I love this glue gun
this sure bond our glue guns so much and here's my new baby this sure Bhandar
ultra dual temp glue gun and wow I am really impressed with this baby so let's
take it out of the package and let's talk about the cool features this gun
has now you guys know I need two things from a glue gun nozzle and when is a
small hole for precise application right and the other is I need a bare metal
nozzle so I can shape the glue once I've applied it to the surface and this
little set works perfectly because they have this little teeny applicator in
this set and this is what I'm gonna use for my glue gun I also like the long
thin nozzle itself it makes it great for getting into small areas and spreading
the glue very nicely one thing that I was very impressed with
with this glue gun that I've never ever seen actually on another glue gun is
that it doesn't leak okay I had it standing up heated and it never
leaked I got it like a little drip on the nozzle there but it never fell off
the only time I've seen it leak is when I first turn it on maybe a teeny squirt
of glue will come out and then that's it it never leaks for the rest of the
session and that is super impressive to me
because my other glue guns leak like crazy they leak everywhere and so I was
super impressed with that feature another feature I like is the hot and
low temp feature because you can heat up the glue more and then get a more steady
flow of the glue but it tends to kind of blend together or you can cool it down
and you can shape it better so it doesn't just turn into one blob the gun
also has an indicator light when it's on which is really nice now something I had
on my other glue gun that this one does not have is the on/off switch which I
thought I would miss but it turns out since the glue gun doesn't leak that's
not a problem and the gun has a feature that shuts
itself off after a half an hour of in use so that is awesome and you can see
that on the indicator the indicator actually goes off when the glue gun
shuts itself off but if you want to start using the glue gun again you just
pull the trigger give it a little nudge and the glue gun will kick back on so
that is a really cool feature and a really good safety feature too because
I've left my glue gun on and like I'm so glad nothing bad happened but with this
you have that safety feature of the gun kicking itself off all right guys let's
take this baby for a test drive yeah I really like the kickstand on this too
it's really easy and nice a lot of like glue guns have jump kick stands that
come off very easily this one's great and really helps the glue gun stand up
but anyways let's try it out so let's shard off some hot glue here on our
cardboard and really nice fine control on this I really like it that small
nozzle is great and then do some texture here you can just square low we can
squirt a little hot glue on the cardboard and just drag the nozzle
through and you know I really like that thin nozzle there
and the metal nozzle so I can heat up the glue and shape it how I want really
cool really cool really impressed with it I got that pack of nozzles so let's
try another one out first you got to take the nozzle off the old one you
wanna heat it up for about five minutes to loosen it up loosen up the glue in
the nozzle and then just use a glove to spin it off and comes off very easily
and then we'll apply the other one here use your glove and then just hand
tighten it and then tighten it with the wrench just a little bit you don't get
too tight and I want to try out this duckbill nozzles what I'm calling it so
it sounds interesting so let's try that out
all right so here's our cardboard and let's try it out so we'll squirt some on
the surface and then you can kind of use that duckbill shape to drag the hot glue
to it thin consistency and I really like that that's something that's kind of
hard with other nozzles right and this would be great for like doing water and
stuff you could thin it out quite a bit more than you could with us some other
hot glue nozzles so really cool I really like this
another thing you may have noticed about the hot glue gun is it has those fins on
the side right and that's not just an aesthetic feature it is actually a
practical feature and it keeps the glue gun if you set it on its side from just
laying flat in the glue like backing up into the chamber so just really smart
little design choices on this glue gun and one of the best things that guns
just a little more expensive than the CC better glue gun but it has a ton more
features it also uses the larger glue stick so you have more glue in your gun
and it has that great feature of no leaking so that is worth the price of
admission you can pick up this awesome glue gun at my amazon link below the
video or make sure you go to check out the sure Bhandar website for other
options and accessories hey friends I hope you liked seeing the features of
this glue gun I want to tell you that sure Bonner and I are going to give away
a set a glue gun set and that's exactly what I was showing you right so very
cool so go to my other video and enter the contest for your chance to win this
